subject: Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
College Athletics
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: As the San Diego State improbably vies for a No. 1 seed in the N.C.A.A. tournament, Coach Steve Fisher is nearly a generation removed from the glory and infamy of his days at Michigan.
snippet: As the San Diego State improbably vies for a No. 1 seed in the N.C.A.A. tournament, Coach Steve Fisher is nearly a generation removed from the glory and infamy of his days at Michigan.
